sections.content:
Good day to you all, except Heg.

You know, it's pretty nice when I go undefeated...
There are six teams at 2-1. Ryan leads in Points For...

CMAC - I'm Bromberg chunky
Cooper Kupp - Let The Force Be With Vu
...

Week 1 - (162.44) Rev. Dongo Pewee
Honorable Mention...

Let The Force Be With Vu vs A Hall Lotta Love
136.04–137.05
...

As always, good luck to you all, except for Smelly.
(I hope you stub your toe.)
